name: React-hn
tagline: build hacker news using react and other new tech
body:
### simple hacker news page
uses: `react(dev) react-lite(prod) react-router redux react-redux`

1. 开发时使用react，发布使用react-lite，减少文件体积
2. android上，动画可能会导致`componentDidMount`不执行（原因暂不知），所以去掉了转场动画
3. story 列表页的滚动记录

4. TODO: `unit test`，`propType`检测
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
